div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 2185 Camarina environs, c. 1928 Burial: c. 289 B.C. (Jenkins) Contents: c. 76 EL, 2 AV, 269 AR Lot A-Camarina, 1928 Camarina: 1 fr. Syracuse: 5 EL "50-litra" 5 EL "25-litra" 2 AV st. (Agathocles) Siculo-Punic: 1 tetradr. (Heracles/horse hd.) Carthage: 3 EL (Jenkins-Lewis, Grp. V) Pegasi Corinth: 9 st. (Per. V, mainly ΑΡ, ΔΙ) 7 dr. Anactorium: 20 (incl. bucranium ΚΛΕΟ [3]; altar ΔΩ [9]; club ΕΠΙ [1]; thy- miaterion ΔϒΣΙ [1]) Argos: 16 (Cor. helmet [1]; shield and ΔΙ [13]; spear [2]) Coronta?: I Hipponium: 1 (as BMC pl. 39, 2) Leucas: 9 (incl. Α in wreath [3]; helmet ΤΙ [1]) Syracuse: 6 (Agathocles [3]; Agathocles, reduced wt. [3]) Thyrrheium: 17 (ear-ring [13]; Boeotian shield [4]) Unc.: 4 Lot B-Scoglitti (4 km. N of Camarina), 1938 Rhegium: 1 tetradr. Messana: 1 tetradr. Syracuse: 3 tetradr. (5th cent.) 19 EL "50-litra" 13 EL "24-litra" 10 tetradr. (Agathocles, quadr. [1]; Nike and trophy [9]) Siculo-Punic: 1 tetradr. (Heracles/horse hd.) Carthage: 31 EL st. (Jenkins-Lewis, Grp. IV, 4; Grp. V, 27) Athens: 1 tetradr. Pegasi Corinth: 32 st.; 5 dr. Ambracia: 1 Anactorium: 17 (incl. altar ΔΩ [7]; club ΕΠΙ [1]; fillet ΝΑϒ [1]; thymiaterion ΛϒΣΙ [1]) Argos: 23 (shield ΔΙ [17]; Cor. helmet [6]) Dyrrhachium: 1 Leucas: 14 Metropolis: 1 Syracuse: 5 (Agathocles, reduced wt.) Thyrrheium: 45 (ear-ring [28]; Boeotian shield [16]) Unc.: 16 (most are probably Argos) Lot C-Associated with Lot B are the fol- lowing, probably intrusive: Taras: 6 (Evans Per. V-VIII) Heracleia: 1 didr. (reduced wt.) Locri: 2 Carthage: 1 (as SNGLloyd 1666) Also Cappadocia, Thr. Chersonese, Philip II AV, Brettii AR, Roman Rep. AR Disposition: Syracuse Currò Pisanò (Lot A) AIIN 1962-4, p. 226; (Lots B and C) p. 227 Jenkins-Lewis, Carthage, (Lot A) p. 57 (first group); (Lots B and C) p. 57 (second group) Despite the widely separate dates at which Lots A and B entered the collection at Syracuse, the similar location and the close parallelism of contents strongly suggests that both are parts of the same find, as assumed by Jenkins- Lewis
